params.name: enode
params.description: enode: string - enode URL of peer to add

result.name: Peer
result.description: result: boolean - true if peer added or false if peer already a static nodes

examples.name: enode
examples.description: String - enode URL of peer to add

result.name: Result
result.description: Boolean - true if peer added or false if peer already a static node

methods.name: admin_changeLogLevel
methods.description:
Changes the log level without restarting Besu. You can change the log level for all logs, or you can change the log level for specific packages or classes.
You can specify only one log level per RPC call.
methods.summary: Changes the log level without restarting Besu.

params.name: log_filter
params.description: array - (optional) packages or classes for which to change the log level

result.name: Log Changed
result.description: result: string - Success if the log level has changed, otherwise error

examples.name: Log level
examples.description: String - enode URL of peer to add

result.name: Result
result.description: Success if the log level has changed, otherwise error

methods.name: admin_generateLogBloomCache
methods.description: Generates cached log bloom indexes for blocks. APIs such as eth_getLogs and eth_getFilterLogs use the cache for improved performance.
methods.summary: Generates cached log bloom indexes for blocks

params.name: startBlock
params.description: String - block to start generating indexes

params.name: startBlock
params.description: String - block to stop generating indexes

result.name: Log bloom index details
result.description: result: string - Success if the log level has changed, otherwise error

examples.name: Log level
examples.description: String - enode URL of peer to add

methods.name: web3_sha3
